name: Chili Legends
description:
You play the story of Chili Legends! After sending a singal to space the Meat-Planet has started an invasion against the veggies. Arm yourself! Protect your buddies! Fight against the nasty meat and save the vegetables!

★ Here is what makes Chili Legends awesome:

✔ 5 Worlds and over 60 Levels

✔ Arm yourself with weapons and become a Mech

✔ Protect yourself with armour

✔ Cool graphic-design and gameplay

✔ Special-Effects

This is the game you've been waiting for.

Join Chili Legends now and defeat the endboss!
